name: Durak Online card game
description:
Durak online - the favorite card game.
Play on the iPhone! Play on the iPad!
Play with your friends! Find new friends!
Be a champion!

• User-friendly interface with landscape mode.
• Real online multiplayer game with real people all over the world (2-6 players).
• 24, 36 or 52 card deck on your choice.
• Classic rules – “Throw-in” or “Passing” modes.
• Possibility to throw-in more then just one card in one turn.
• Tricky-game mode.
• Draw (optional).
• Friends, chats, gifts, leaderboard.
• Private games with password or by invitation.
• Possibility to play next game with same players.
• Possibility to cancel accidental thrown card.
• Save account settings to iCloud and restore on another device.

The object of the game is to get rid of all one's cards. At the end of the game, the last player with cards in their hand is referred to as the fool (durak).
